org.gvsig.symbology.fmap.symbols
Class GradientFillSymbol

java.lang.Object
  com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.core.symbols.AbstractSymbol
      com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.core.symbols.AbstractFillSymbol
          org.gvsig.symbology.fmap.symbols.GradientFillSymbol
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.core.CartographicSupport, com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.core.IPrintable, com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.core.symbols.IFillSymbol, com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.core.symbols.ISymbol, com.iver.utiles.IPersistence
public class GradientFillSymbol
extends com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.core.symbols.AbstractFillSymbol

Allows the user to fill a polygon with a gradient color.This gradient can be painted with 4 different methods (linal, rectangular, circular and buffered) and, for each one will be possible to modify its angle, percentage and intervals.

Author:
pepe vidal salvador - jose.vidal.salvador@iver.es
